title: A Year to Remember 1943
brief_description: Collection of newsreel footage which made up Australia’s history in 1943 - Preparing for an assault on Salamaua - Trade Unions lend full support at Appeal - Sydney wharfies go on strike - Women work as stockmen - Hospital ships arrive in Sydney - Japanese submarine sinks an Australian hospital ship - Battle of Stalingrad - Gary Cooper arrives in Brisbane - Women demonstrate Aussie Rules football … and much more. Rated: G
